name: The Mightyest Quest
description:
Merge into an epic* quest given by Uizard Layry, a wizard. Find all the runes to destroy the Great Evil Tower, 5 levels, 3 worlds.

Once you get in the portal you only have 30 seconds to complete each stage or you will be killed by the Great Evil Tower.

Playable System Requirements (minimum @ 720p):

NVidia Geforce 610m

Intel Core i3-3110M CPU @ 2.40GHz

4 GB Ram
